#!/usr/bin/env python3

def read_ints():
	return list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
	
t, k = read_ints()

all = []

for _ in range(k):
	avail = list(read_ints())
	for x in avail[1:]:
		all.append(x)

all.sort()

res_min, res_max = 0, 0

last = 0
for num in all:
	d = num-last
	res_min += (d)//2
	res_max += d-1

	last = num

d = t-last
res_min += (d)//2
res_max += d-1

print(res_min, res_max)

    v2 += cr[0] - prev - 1
    prev = cr[1]

def main():
    x, k = map(int, input().split())
    l = [(0, 0)]
    for _ in range(k):
        tmp = list(map(int, input().split()))
        l.append((tmp[1], tmp[-1]))
        l.sort()
    l.append((x, x))
    mi = ma = 0
    for (a, b), (c, _) in zip(l, l[1:]):
        x = c - b
        mi += x // 2
        ma += x - 1
    print(mi, ma)


def __starting_point():
    main()
